title: LegenVD
description:
Magic the Gathering strategy videos with a focus on the digital Magic Arena.
This channel is supported by its fans on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Beating people with their own cards.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a white/blue/red or Jeskai combo deck, featuring Portal to Phyrexia, One with the Multiverse and Builder's Talent from Bloomburrow in Standard. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD
